[Forsameekle as by ane act ...] Scotland. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I) Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
[2] p.
Printed by Thomas Finlason ..., Edinburgh : [1627]
T.p. lacking; title suggested by STC (2nd ed.). Date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.). "Given under our signet at Holy-Rood-House, the twentie five day of Ianuar. and of our reigne the second yeare. 1627"--P. [2]. Concerning the holding of weaponshaws. Reproduction of original in the Town House (Aberdeen, Scotland). Charter Room.
